title: The Fashion in Shrouds
description: Detective Albert Campion has a talented dress designer sister with celebrated clients. Georgia Wells is a glamorous actress who exemplifies the 1930s femme fatale. Vain, stupid, and selfish, she attracts men like moths to a flame. When these men die, Albert suspects Georgia is more deliberately fatale than alluring.All the books from Albert Campion series are standalone titles and can be read in any order.
author: Margery Allingham
